page.description: Return a blob containing the contents of a .JPEG formatted QRCode image.
page.syntax: PUBLIC STATIC GenerateJpeg AS B (text AS C, correctionLevel AS C)

argument.name: correctionLevel AS C
argument.description: Correction level can be L,M,Q or H (L=7%, M=15%, Q=25%, H=30%). See [QRCode Namespace] for more information.

page.example:
dim jpgData as b = ::QRCode::Creator::GenerateJpeg("Hello world","M") dim html as c = "

" a5_show_html(html)
